description:
There are two types of people in this world: those who consider power banks essential, and those who haven’t come around just yet. You never want to be caught with a dead phone, right? Well, a power bank is your solution to low phone battery while out and about.

The Anker Zolo is one of my favorite power banks, partly because it’s so compact and travel-friendly, partly because it has a built-in USB-C cable. And now that it’s on sale for $13.68 on Amazon — mere pennies shy of its all-time best sale price — there’s never been a better time to snag one. Be sure to click the checkbox for the additional 15 percent off coupon to get the full discount!

With its 10,000mAh capacity, this power bank has enough energy to replenish your phone’s battery about
title: Anker’s tiny power bank with a built-in USB-C cable is just $13 (50% off)

description:
In 2024, Microsoft’s gaming chief Phil Spencer said that he wanted handheld gaming PCs to feel more like an Xbox. But as the saying goes, if you want something done right, do it yourself. Thus, Microsoft is reportedly working on its own handheld Xbox PC console.

The console, code-named “Keenan,” is apparently so far along in development that it may debut in 2025, according to Windows Central. Details are still scarce, including the dimensions, how much it would cost, and what would be inside it. What is apparent, however, is that it will give the new handheld a decidedly Xbox look and feel, something that Spencer made a poin
title: Microsoft’s Xbox handheld is real — and could be coming this year

description:
Sometimes you have to enter your email address on sites that don’t seem trustworthy. For example, you have to provide an email address for free web access in cafés, buses, and railway stations. If you don’t want to provide your email address and risk getting a lot of spam, you can use a temporary email service.

These temporary addresses only work for about 10 minutes, so you can use it on sites where you have to register. During the 10 minutes that the address is active, you have time to get the code you need and then the address stops working.

That said, we’d recommend changing your password on the web page that you used a temporary address on, as we’re not sure what these services do with the information that passes through them.

Here are four popular temporary email services:
title: 4 free temporary email services that stop spam dead

description:
Buying a game controller for your PC is a task fraught with uncertainty and confusion. While gaming on a console typically locks you into whatever stock controller came with the system (or a few alternatives), gaming on a PC opens up a much wider range of options to explore.

Not sure where to begin? I’ll take you through it! Here’s the ultimate guide to buying a game controller for PC gaming. I’ll tell you all about the different types of controllers, their various pros and cons, the features you need to be aware of, and any caveats worth keeping in mind.

Xbox controller
title: Buying a PC game controller is all about options. Cut through the BS with this guide

description:

Expert's Rating

Pros

  • Stunning display

Cons

  • No headphone jack
  • Fingerprint reader is in an odd spot

title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 9i 14 review: Sleek and shiny, but with trade-offs

description:

title: Upgrading to a new PC? You’ll want to wipe your old laptop with this shredder
